pr_title: KAFKA-9918 SslEngineFactory is NOT closed when channel is closing

timeline.bodyText: It seems to me adding a KIP for this interface change would be an overkill. But, I'm ok to write a KIP if it worth it.
timeline.author: chia7712

replies.bodyText: I don't think we consider SslFactory a public API, so I think we are probably good here.
replies.author: hachikuji
